_purpose: AI behavior guidelines - how AI should work on this project

items.title: Visual Naming Convention
items.description: Name components by visual pattern, not usage context. Good: nav-bar, nav-rail, nav-accordion, app-shell-stacked, app-shell-sidebar. Bad: nav-desktop, nav-mobile, app-shell-site. Consistent naming = predictable system.

items.title: Slots for SEO
items.description: Nav components use slots so users provide native <a> tags. SEO crawlers follow links regardless of wrapper element. Component handles behavior (expand/collapse), user controls actual links and content.

items.title: Single Token Principle
items.description: Prefer one token over variants when one value works everywhere. Example: --shell-gap instead of --shell-gap-1/2/3. Simpler to use, easier to maintain, consistent results.

items.title: Native Elements for Layout
items.description: Use native HTML tags (header, footer, nav, section) with CSS styling instead of custom web components when no JS behavior is needed. Element-first philosophy - enhance natives, don't replace them.
